text: DWSI (864 kHz) Sonshine Radio is an AM radio station owned and operated by Sonshine Media Network International. The station's studio and transmitter are located at the 2nd Floor, Sarangaya Bldg., Brgy. Sinsayon, Santiago City. On the morning of June 26, 2001, DWSI's studio was shot at by unidentified men. ==References== Category:Radio stations in Isabela (province) Category:Radio stations established in 1967
title: DWSI
